Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Westbound Reroute near Pershing/Francisco
ShortDescription: WB 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Pershing, Fancisco, 38th, Kedzie and Pershing due to, street blockage near Pershing/Francisco.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Pershing, Fancisco, 38th, Kedzie and Pershing due to, street blockage near Pershing/Francisco.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 67th/Rhodes

Eastbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 68th, Cottage Grove, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Rhodes.
